App Name: Free Music Player

Brief:

Dive into a world of auditory bliss with Free Music Player, an all-encompassing audio experience that caters to avid music enthusiasts. Whether online sensations or treasured offline collections, this app fine-tunes your listening journey with an array of features right at your fingertips.
